body.name: Wet Dust Mops for Hardwood Floor Cleaning - MEXERRIS Microfiber Spray Mops with 4X Reusable Washable Pads 2X Bottles Wood Floor Mops with Spray Home Commercial Use for Hardwood Laminate Tiles Floors
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Friday, February 16. Order within 15 hrs 10 mins
features: REUSABLE MOP PADS KITS -You will love the 4 spray mop pads that are washable and the different colors make it easier to change out for each room. Once a pad becomes soiled and grubby, it is simple to replace it with a clean pad from the selection supplied. With the disposable ones, you would have to go to spot multiple times and scrubbed before the spot came off. With MEXERRIS microfiber mop pads, you go over it once maybe twice and it gets the gunk off the floors.

Easy Assembly, Don't Soaking Floors: Microfiber floor mop comes tightly packaged in OEM box, and the handles are all separate. Spray mop just click together and wait for the click the final part just line up the holes to hear a click ,then complete assembly. Just under the top handle is a trigger which when pulled shoots a fine spray out onto the floor right in front of the mop, then you just simply push forwards into it. Misty spray, lightly dampens dirt instead of soaking your floor.

2 Bottle as Backup : If you have had a similar microfibre mop in the past but what you found with that one was after a short while, the bottle started leaking badly resulting in you putting it out for the rubbish. MEXERRIS Wet mop comes with bottle (x 2) which you fill with water or a soap/floor detergent of your choice and then simply click into place.You will are pleasantly surprised to see our mop comes with a spare bottle, so if the bottle go wrong and leak, you have another one as backup.

360° Swivel Mop Head: You will like the way this mop handles. The head moves in any direction you choose so it makes cleaning close to skirtings a breeze, plus getting under hard-to-reach areas is easier. There is also a scraper attachment on the handle that will allow you to scrub any stubborn marks/dirt on the floor.You’ve literally just don’t you entire lounge and kitchen in less than ten minutes, more than half the time less than you usually take - and the finish is smooth and streak free.

Multi-scene Use：Microfiber hardwood floor mop is well-made, and aesthetically designed. The material is hard plastic and Aluminium alloy poles. Moreover, The mop has an ergonomic handles which is great for the people with back pain problem, due to the fact that it is light weight, ,easy grip, and has a hanging option as well. You can not only use the microfiber mob for all floor types like Hardwood, Laminate Wood, Ceramic Tiles, but also can use for cleaning wall or ceilings.

Buy with Confidence: We’d love hear from you about our product, Regardless of positive side or negative side, we are working on doing it better! If you are not fully satisfied. Please don’t hesitate to contact us if you need help.[Small Tip: ①Each spray mop has be spray function tested before sent,a small amount of water may remain in bottle is normal phenomenon.②Please clean the water tank and spray nozzle of the floor mop after use to keep it clean and protected.

MEXERRIS Tips:③Please don't fill boiling or impurity water, strong acid,alkali detergent into the bottle of the wet mop.④Please fully dilute solutions with plain water,because concentrated solutions may corrode mop internal parts or some floor types. ⑤ There are two small silicone plugs on the bottle cap of our spray mop. Please be careful not to lose them when cleaning the bottle to prevent the bottle from leaking.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Check Out MEXERRIS Wet Mops Store and Find the Best Spray Mop for You. The floor cleaning mop, no doubt is very convenient and easy to use. Wood floor mop is great for the people with back pain problem, due to the fact that it is light weight, and ergonomically designed.Since the microfiber pads are so absorbent, they removed dirt and marks in one stroke.

MEXERRIS Small Tip 1. Each mop before we shipped out need to be carefully test the sprayer, so It is normal that if you find some water in the bottle, not being used. 2. Please clean the water bottle and spray nozzle of the spray mop for cleaner after use.

Multi-secene use MEXERRIS Mop Spray Floor Mops Additional information: 1)You can fill the bottle with your own preference cleaning solutions, but except acid or boiling water. 2)The pads are reusable and machine washable. • Microfiber mop has a scraper to separate hairs stuck on the mop pads. • Hardwood floor mop has a 360 swivel head which makes it really easy to get into all the corners and underneath things. • You can use the microfiber wood floor mob for other purposes as well, such as cleaning wall，windows or ceilings.

What You Get in Package MEXERRIS SPRAY MOPS SIZE In the box: You receive a unit itself, 4 microfiber pads and two refillable bottles. Appearance: The wet mops is well-made, and aesthetically designed. The material is hard plastic and Aluminium alloy poles.Moreover, this floor mop has an ergonomic handles, easy grip, and has a hanging option as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Glides So Easily and Cleans Well
reviews.reviewText: This product is light and swivels so well. Better than competing type products. I love putting my own solution in it. Very easy to assemble—especially someone with hands that hurt often and tremble periodically. Also, does not catch on the floor as it glides. Would definitely recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent, Excellent, Excellent!!!!
reviews.reviewText: Wish we'd found this mop years ago. What a great time saver, easy to use and works excellent!!! And, it cuts cleaning time down to just a few minutes!!! Great product!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Works well. OK for the price.
reviews.reviewText: This little mop does a good job, though it feels a little flimsy. Love that we can use our own cleaning solutions. This saves a bunch of money over time. Easy to assemble. Comes with extra bottle and pads. Pads go in with the regular wash and come out like new. No batteries needed!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I was worried when I unboxed it because it feels cheap and flimsy. I just used it for the first time and it's as good as any dry/wet mop. I'm so glad I didn't get a Swiffer.One note--because it doesn't take batteries, the spray function is like a spray bottle. If you have large floors, your hand might get sore. Thankfully I have a small apartment so it's manageable. Plus the spray is spread wide, not a stream, so you really don't have to spray that much. Easy compromise for the price and lack of waste.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This is a great mop. Good value.I like at you can use your own cleaner, the extra bottle and pads. The best feature for me is the little tool to brush the pet hair and solid gunk off the used pad so you can wash the pad without just putting filth in your washer.It's easy to put together. It's lightweight.It's aluminum not steel so it's not really made for deep cleaning/scrubbing. It's solid for what it's supposed to be though. A daily mop. It's not going to do edges or scrub or anything requiring much pressure. Which is fine.Would recommend

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Stopped spraying after few months
reviews.reviewText: For me to go through the trouble of leaving a review is a lot. At first, I loved the products. It cleaned smoothly and sprayed beautifully with one single push of the handle. After a couple of months every time I would squeeze the handle it would get stuck and not want to spray but just a few drops. Needless to say, I kept trying to use it and would push the handle down so that I could pull it up and liquid would come out. Today was the death of the mop. It stopped spraying altogether.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I was tired of buying pads and cleaner for my swifter. This product I'd 10X better. It cleans better and the pads are washable. The pads dIDnot shrink WHEN I PUT THEM THROUGH THE WASHER AND DRYER. I am very happy with this product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use!
reviews.reviewText: It’s a little flimsy. I do wish it was more sturdy.
Very pleased with this item, great value, would buy again without hesitation. Love having several pads and 2 bottles for cleaner.
No lo compren, el atomizador deja de funcionar al segundo uso, y es bastante caro!

Me encanta que con menos de 1 lt de agua puedo limpiar toda la casa. De hecho, hasta te ahorras la barrida, puedes ir directo a trapear, ya que el trapeador también agarra fibras etc. Pero yo si recomiendo barrer y luego trapear. Ahorras agua y tiempo!!

Ho acquistato questo articolo su consiglio di una mia amica e trovo che sia davvero indispensabile per chi, come me, ha dei bimbi piccoli e deve pensare alle pulizie di casa. Pratico e molto efficiente

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love this mop! Should have brought one years ago.It’s really easy to assemble and fill. Light and glides nicely on the floor. The edges of the head are slim and flat and the cloths extend further out from the head with frilled edges making it easy to get into corners and under the front edge of the cooker / washing machine.It comes with a cloth head on the head and two spares. The cloths supplied are great quality and well designed.I’m really impressed with the price, design and overall quality of this mop - 10/10
